scripts.libs: npm run postinstall && npm run lib-feedback && npm run lib-style && npm run lib-wallet && npm run lib-idp-scatter && npm run lib-idp-local && npm run lib-rex && npm run lib-dex
scripts.lib-rex: echo 'npm run check-node-version && ng build @vapaee/rex --prod SKIPPED'
scripts.lib-dex: echo 'npm run check-node-version && ng build @vapaee/dex --prod SKIPPED'
scripts.lib-scatter: echo 'npm run check-node-version && ng build @vapaee/scatter --prod SKIPPED'
scripts.lib-idp-scatter: echo 'npm run check-node-version && ng build @vapaee/idp-scatter --prod SKIPPED'
scripts.publish-libs: npm run publish-lib-feedback; npm run publish-lib-style; npm run publish-lib-wallet; npm run publish-lib-idp-scatter; npm run publish-lib-idp-local; npm run publish-lib-rex; npm run publish-lib-dex
scripts.publish-lib-rex: echo 'cd dist/vapaee/rex && npm publish --access public SKIPPED'
scripts.publish-lib-dex: echo 'cd dist/vapaee/dex && npm publish --access public SKIPPED'
scripts.publish-lib-scatter: echo 'cd dist/vapaee/scatter && npm publish --access public SKIPPED'
scripts.publish-lib-idp-scatter: echo 'cd dist/vapaee/idp-scatter && npm publish --access public SKIPPED'
scripts.deploy: npm run libs && npm run deploynow
scripts.prepare-website: if [ ! -d './vapaee.io' ]; then git clone https://github.com/vapaee/vapaee.io-website.git ./vapaee.io; fi; cd ./vapaee.io && git pull && cd ..;
scripts.deploynow: npm run prepare-website; npm run buildprod && npm run cpbasic && npm run copycert && cd ./vapaee.io/www && npm run save && amazon_server_console
scripts.full: npm i; npm run libs; cd contracts/_examples; if [ ! -d 'eosio.contracts' ]; then git clone https://github.com/Telos-Foundation/eosio.contracts; fi; npm run serve
scripts.prod: git checkout prod && git merge master -m 'merge master' && npm run buildprod && git add -A && git commit -m 'update' && git push && amazon_server_console;
